snippet.title: Shattered - Tale of the Forgotten King Official Trailer (Early Access release)
snippet.description:
Shattered - Tale of the Forgotten King is an action-adventure RPG taking place in the broken world of Hypnos. Epic boss fights, complex narrative, Shattered is inspired by Dark Souls, Shadow of the Colossus and Legacy of Kain. Hypnos is opening its doors, dear Wanderers!
June 4th 2019, be ready!

Wishlist the game on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1045180/Shattered__Tale_of_the_Forgotten_King/

• https://www.facebook.com/taleoftheforgottenking/
• https://twitter.com/RedlockStudio
• https://www.instagram.com/redlockstudio/
• https://discord.gg/hSveaF9
